DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize , double-blind , placebo tamsulosin-controlled , parallel design , multinational study evaluate efficacy safety Tadalafil once-a-day dose 12 week Asian men sign symptom benign prostatic hyperplasia ( BPH ) .
DOC.brief_title: Multinational Study Evaluate Tadalafil Asian Men With Signs Symptoms Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
DOC.criteria: Asian male , benign prostatic hyperplasia ( BPH ) least 6 month prior initiation IPSS score great equal 13 beginning treatment Agree use approve experimental pharmacologic BPH , erectile dysfunction ( ED ) overactive bladder ( OAB ) treatment time study . Have take Finasteride Dutasteride therapy , Antiandrogenic hormone BPH therapy , ED OAB therapy specify duration time prior begin treatment Prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) score beyond acceptable range define study initiation History urinary retention lower urinary tract ( bladder ) stone within 6 month initiation History urinary urethral obstruction due stricture , valve , sclerosis , tumor initiation Clinical evidence prostate cancer initiation Clinical evidence bladder urinary tract condition , may affect low urinary tract symptom initiation History cardiac condition , include Angina require certain treatment nitrate , unstable angina define study , positive cardiac stress test start study History significant central nervous system injury ( include stroke spinal cord injury within 6 month initiation ) Use nitrate , cancer chemotherapy , androgen , antiandrogens , estrogen , luteinizing hormonereleasing hormone ( LHRH ) agonists/antagonists , anabolic steroid initiation
